title: My Empress Apprentice Is Becoming Evil
alternative_title: Fantasy: My Apprentice is Going to Become Dark
status: Fantasy: My Apprentice is Going to Become Dark
description:
Description :
        This book will never abuse the protagonist, the system is just a tool. Travel through the fantasy world! Become the master of the empress before she turned evil. The little apprentice who was abused in every way suddenly found that her master became gentle and powerful, and became more and more hard-mouthed and soft-hearted towards her... Su Changge: Damn system, I don’t want to be a scumbag villain! System: Born as a scumbag, destined to be a villain! Feng Wanqing: What should I do if I like my own master? I want to have a sweet love affair with my master, and my master can only...
